em++   -s USE_WEBGL2=1 -s USE_WEBGL2=1 -s USE_SDL=2 -s USE_SDL_IMAGE=2 -s SDL2_IMAGE_FORMATS=["png"] -s WASM=1 --preload-file /home/runner/work/game-rogue-sdl/game-rogue-sdl/resources/sprites/BirdOfAnger.png@/resources/sprites/BirdOfAnger.png -g  -rdynamic CMakeFiles/main.dir/src/main.cpp.o  -o main.js
